page.title: 16Recreation and social life
page.content: Saffron Walden is said to have more clubs and societies per head of poulation than any other town in England. This may or may not be true but there are a lot. From the political parties to allotment societies to Welsh societies, the churches, hobbies, everything seems catered for. In a small town some events involve most of the town. Every three years there is a carnival with floats from all the organisations, businesses and schools. Each year there is an open air play in the museum grounds by the castle which is packed out and the High School Farm Club Dance is a major social event.
